app_descript:
Brief: Taimi is a versatile and inclusive LGBTQ+ dating and social networking app that caters to a wide array of queer individuals. It offers its users the ability to match, chat, and connect with like-minded people through a spectrum of features. Taimi goes beyond the traditional dating scene to foster a community where friendships, relationships, and genuine connections flourish in a safe, welcoming environment.

  • Locality-Based Matching: Discover real users in your vicinity with the convenience of filtering to find matches that matter to you. ğŸ“
  • Interactions Tracker: See who has liked your profile and keep tabs on interests. âœ¨
  • Special Interest Communities: Connect with user groups sharing various interests such as gaming, pets, movies, music, and memes. ğŸ®ğŸ¾ğŸ¬ğŸ¶
  • Account Insights: Analyze the full statistics of your Taimi account for an in-depth understanding of your interactions. ğŸ“Š
  • Security Features: Protect your privacy with PIN, face recognition, and fingerprint authentication. ğŸ”’
